original_text: We have therefore sent Judas and Silas, who themselves will tell you the same things by word of mouth.
korean_text: 그리하여 유다와 실라를 보내니 그들도 이 일을 말로 전하리라

sentences.original_text: We have therefore sent Judas and Silas
who themselves will tell you the same things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 친히 너희에게 동일한 것들을 말할 것입니다
